profile.article_title: Family Loses Home and Two Pets in D.C. Fire

convo.content: Hey! I just read this article called "Brothers Behind Bars," and it really hit me hard. It talks about these three brothers who grew up in foster care after their mom went to prison when they were super young. I can't believe how much they went through, bouncing from home to home and never getting adopted. Sometimes seeing the impact of our efforts firsthand can be really powerful in motivating us to keep working towards change.
